titleStmt.title: A dialogue between Mr. Merriman, and Dr. Chymist: concerning John Sergents paradoxes, in his New method to science, and his Solid philosophy. By T.W.
titleStmt.author: T. W.

notesStmt.note: In response to Sergeant, John. Solid philosophy asserted, against the fancies of the ideists, or The method to science farther illustrated.
